item.description:
Hello wonderful members,

The date for rock climbing is now changed to March 20th.

Get ready to test your primate climbing skill. Let's go Indoor Rock Climbing! All levels welcome, last year the majority of attendees were first timers.

We had a huge group turn out last year and we want this event to be big like that again. So mark your calendar and sign up early for some amazing time at the Metro Rock Gym.

We will collect the fee in advance to make the group reservation. The cost is $25 per person. Payment instructions will be given to those that RSVP. If you have your own equipment, it's $16/day pass, and you can pay directly @ the counter on that day.

Pics from last year: http://www.meetup.com...
item.how_to_find_us: Find a bunch of Asians in the front lobby. :)

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Indoor Rock Climbing
